channel.title: Life on Dušan Stanković
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Dušan Stanković

item.title: First time in Africa - Namibia
item.description: In June 2017, during a team building event, I spoke with a colleague about traveling to Africa. We shared our ideas why we would love to travel there and what should we do and see. Since I held a few programming courses back in Serbia one of my wishes was to do the same thing somewhere in Africa. My colleague said he would like to visit Ethiopia, see how they live and get a taste of their culture, but didn’t have anything against visiting some other country.
